alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 06 at 6:48PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN LARAMIE COUNTY... At 648 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from near Whitaker to 8 miles northwest of Hillsdale...and moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 25 mph and visibilities less than one mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and low visibilities. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Burns, South Greeley, Hillsdale, Ranchettes, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, Whitaker, North Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, Carpenter, Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 30. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 351 and 389. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Expect rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Motorists are urged to use extreme caution if traveling through these areas!

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
